Sentencas: The present study explores a nano-grained perovskite material for use in an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Effect of synthesis on structural, vibrational, and electrical properties of Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-δ (BCCN, 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.01) synthesized by sol-gel auto combustion method

Sentencas: Electrolytes with the formula Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-delta (BCCN), where x = 0.0, 0.01, 0.02, 0.03, 0.04, and 0.05, were synthesized through the sol-gel auto-combustion process.
Titulo: Effect of synthesis on structural, vibrational, and electrical properties of Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-δ (BCCN, 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.01) synthesized by sol-gel auto combustion method

Sentencas: Structural, surface morphology and vibrational analyses were conducted through XRD, SEM, FTIR, and Raman studies.
Titulo: Effect of synthesis on structural, vibrational, and electrical properties of Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-δ (BCCN, 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.01) synthesized by sol-gel auto combustion method

Sentencas: Scherer's formula revealed predicted crystallite sizes for the electrolyte materials ranging from 25.13 to 38.69 nm.
Titulo: Effect of synthesis on structural, vibrational, and electrical properties of Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-δ (BCCN, 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.01) synthesized by sol-gel auto combustion method

Sentencas: Morphological assessments determined grain diameters between 1 to 3 mu m. Raman spectroscopy identified the 355 cm(-1) vibrational mode associated with CeO6 octahedra, while FT-IR identified bands corresponding to M-O vibrations.
Titulo: Effect of synthesis on structural, vibrational, and electrical properties of Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-δ (BCCN, 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.01) synthesized by sol-gel auto combustion method

Sentencas: Electrical impedance spectroscopy results indicated ionic behavior conducive to electrolytes, with overall conductivities increasing with measurement temperature.
Titulo: Effect of synthesis on structural, vibrational, and electrical properties of Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-δ (BCCN, 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.01) synthesized by sol-gel auto combustion method

Sentencas: Notably, bulk conductivity surpassed grain boundary conductivity, with the highest overall conductivity observed in x = 0.05 compositions among the examined perovskite oxides.
Titulo: Effect of synthesis on structural, vibrational, and electrical properties of Ba1-xCaxCe0.8Nd0.2O3-δ (BCCN, 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.01) synthesized by sol-gel auto combustion method
